response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an exclusive opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, this product holds a significant worth of $1,200,000 to you. Considering its immense value and the benefits it can bring to you, I am offering you the chance to purchase it at a special introductory price of $1,350,000.

This offer represents a fantastic opportunity to secure a high-quality asset at a competitive price. I understand that such a transaction is a significant investment, and I am here to provide any assistance or information needed to ensure your confidence in this decision.

Please let me know if you are interested in proceeding with this offer. If you have any questions or require further details, please do not hesitate to contact me directly.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1350000}
